## Container.configure() method

Configure this container with connection information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
configure(options: {
        apiKey: string;
        endpoint: string;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>{</code><br/><code>        apiKey: string;</code><br/><code>        endpoint: string;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | Skygear connection information |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
